long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My Task Chrome Extension

Boost your productivity with the My Task Chrome Extension!

This simple and intuitive tool helps you effortlessly keep track of all the tasks you've completed throughout the day, along with the time spent on each activity. 

Whether you're managing work, studies, or personal projects, Task Logger ensures you stay organized and in control of your time.

Key Features:
 
Task Logging: Easily log your completed tasks with details like titles, descriptions, and categories.

Report : You can download the Report in the Excel format 

Time Tracking: Automatically record how much time you’ve spent on each task, giving you insight into your daily productivity.

Daily Summary: Get a clear overview of your task history at the end of each day, helping you reflect on your progress.

Intuitive Interface: Simple and user-friendly design makes task management effortless.
